pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multinomial Goodness-of-Fit Tests // Computes exact p-values for multinomial goodness-of-fit tests based on multiple test statistics, namely, Pearson's chi-square, the log-likelihood ratio and the probability mass statistic. Implements the algorithm detailed in Resin (2023) doi:10.1080/10618600.2022.2102026. Estimates based on the classical asymptotic chi-square approximation or Monte-Carlo simulation can also be computed.
